In terms of the HL1-era entries to the Half Life series and the HL2-era entries, this is by far my favorite in the latter category.

good
gmod story mode part 3

The plot thickens! This part of the HL story is the reason everyone wants a sequel. You will learn even more about the vicious Combine and Gordon's mysterious role in this world, but with the knowledge comes even more questions. With a new great map and another two new enemy types the game is yet again changing from before. I personally think this is the overall most fun HL2 game, despite the short campaign at 3-5 hours.
And if you see Dr. Breen tell him i said.. xD

it was a awesome game and my second favorite episode for half life two now that half life alyx is out we might finally get a conclusion to this amazing series but i hope its not a vr game but a normal fps but either way i can't wait to finish this series one day

Shows signs of Valve running out of ideas, but still excellent and there is a reason the cliffhanger has hurt all these years, the narrative is well told and very intriguing. An obvious must play.

Fun story, shooting, obstacles, puzzles, and overall is a great short story compared to Half Life 2.
I gnomed space itself.

I, for the longest time was a fan off the Half-Life series. I played 1 and 2 but I never played the Episodes. I can say that while episode 1 felt like filler, Episode 2 is an absolute masterpiece. I thought that the ending to Half-Life 2 was a a Cliff hanger well this game is like a million times above that. Trust me. This is probably the best game I have ever played. The action and story telling a master level and none of the action segments are boring. all of the characters felt so real and interesting. I played This game entirely in one sitting and I would say do the same thing so you can experience and remember this masterpiece.
the adventure is realy good and the  atmoshpere is surprisingly  strong  even whit does 16 years old graphic

I don't have much to say honestly. The story was (mostly) ok and the levels were (kinda) fun. However, I must comment on the final bit of the game. The ultimate level was horrible. Everything except the AR2 balls and rockets are peashooters to hunters. You have to juggle the striders alone, because everyone in the HL2 universe is incompetent except for Gordon apparently. The story ending was atrocious. A cliffhanger, with a 10+ year wait, that's still ongoing. Overall, a shallow ending to an incredible series.
i dont have a joke for this
iz nice

Пока что последнее (не считая концовки Alyx) сюжетное заключение в истории мира half-life. Очень ярко выделяется своей динамичностью, нововведениями и естественно - популярностью, поскольку её концовку обсуждали 13 лет и вот снова есть поводы обсуждать. Игра вышла практически  на одном уровне с half-life 2, Затмила свою короткую предысторию ep 1, и стала одной из значимых событий в игровой индустрии.
A classic Half Life game. Another masterpiece...

After finishing this one, I can understand why people are angry there's no episode 3...yet.
These game are classic and highly revered for a reason, what more is there to say?  If you haven't played them, they're definitely worth the time, and hold up incredibly well for being 13+ years old.
good game, just upset that episode 3 didn't come out

Great game. Awesome story. Ending is really sad and a big 'ole cliffhanger. In my opinion, Alyx is really annoying though, so going through puzzles with her stupid self can be unenjoyable at times. But the actual puzzles and gameplay is really fun.

This game is very epic, it has many many cool stuff you can do and the fight where dog beats up the strider, so amazing. If you are thinking about the purchase of this game, don't think but go ahead and buy it!

Até agora, o jogo mais sensacional da saga Half Life 2! 

O ambiente de floresta explora muito bem a capacidade gráfica deste magnífico jogo. A história vem sendo muito bem continuada, com um fim meio trágico (que será alterada em Half Life Alyx #spoiler) mas bem coerente. A lanterna agora tem a energia separada do traje, o que é muito bom. Foram horas muito prazerosas imerso neste excelente jogo, obra prima da Valve <3
É Half-Life, quer algo melhor do que isso?
